languages.text: "Каждого "омолодившегося" поощрите регулярной данью на юность и сверхурочными работами — иначе зачем здоровье и долголетие слугам Империума?"
"Grant each 'rejuvenated' individual a regular youth levy and overtime duties — after all, what good are health and long life to the servants of the Imperium?"
languages.original_text: "Каждого "омолодившегося" поощрите регулярной данью на юность и сверхурочными работами — иначе зачем здоровье и долголетие слугам Империума?"

traits.locale_text: "Grant each ‘rejuvenated' individual a regular youth tithe and overtime duties — after all, what good are health and long life to the servants of the Imperium?"
"As long as it does not hinder your service to the Imperium, I will allow it."
"Grant each 'rejuvenated' individual a regular youth levy and overtime duties — after all, what good are health and long life to the servants of the Imperium?"
"Grant each 'rejuvenated' individual a regular youth levy and overtime duties — after all, what good are health and long life to the servants of the Imperium?"
"As long as it does not hinder your service to the Imperium, I will allow it."
"As long as it does not hinder your service to the Imperium, I will allow it."
"Grant each ‘rejuvenated' individual a regular youth tithe and overtime duties — after all, what good are health and long life to the servants of the Imperium?"

languages.text: “所有接受这种‘返老还童疗法’的人，对他们定期征收青春税，再给他们派额外的活干。都是帝国的仆人，哪里需要什么健康长寿？”
languages.original_text: "Grant each 'rejuvenated' individual a regular youth levy and overtime duties — after all, what good are health and long life to the servants of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: “所有接受这种‘返老还童疗法’的人，对他们定期征收青春税，再给他们派额外的活干。都是帝国的仆人，哪里需要什么健康长寿？”

languages.text: 「帝国への奉仕に支障を来さぬ限りは、認めてやろう」
languages.original_text: "As long as it does not hinder your service to the Imperium, I will allow it."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国への奉仕に支障を来さぬ限りは、認めてやろう」

languages.text: «Asigne a los individuos "rejuvenecidos" una tasa de juventud regular y horas extra. A fin de cuentas, ¿para qué quieren los siervos del Imperium salud y larga vida?».
languages.original_text: "Grant each 'rejuvenated' individual a regular youth levy and overtime duties — after all, what good are health and long life to the servants of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: «Asigne a los individuos "rejuvenecidos" una tasa de juventud regular y horas extra. A fin de cuentas, ¿para qué quieren los siervos del Imperium salud y larga vida?».

languages.text: "Her 'gençleşmiş' bireye düzenli olarak gençlik vergisi yazılsın ve fazla mesai görevi verilsin. Sonuçta İmparatorluk'un hizmetkârları için sağlığın ve uzun ömrün anlamı nedir ki?"
languages.original_text: "Grant each 'rejuvenated' individual a regular youth levy and overtime duties — after all, what good are health and long life to the servants of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "Her 'gençleşmiş' bireye düzenli olarak gençlik vergisi yazılsın ve fazla mesai görevi verilsin. Sonuçta İmparatorluk'un hizmetkârları için sağlığın ve uzun ömrün anlamı nedir ki?"

languages.text: « Chaque individu "rajeuni" devra s'acquitter d'un impôt sur la jeunesse et d'heures de service supplémentaires. Car, après tout, en quoi la santé et la longévité sont-elles utiles aux serviteurs de l'Imperium ? »
languages.original_text: "Grant each 'rejuvenated' individual a regular youth levy and overtime duties — after all, what good are health and long life to the servants of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: « Chaque individu "rajeuni" devra s'acquitter d'un impôt sur la jeunesse et d'heures de service supplémentaires. Car, après tout, en quoi la santé et la longévité sont-elles utiles aux serviteurs de l'Imperium ? »

languages.text: "Verpasst jedem 'verjüngten' Individuum eine Jugendsteuer und Überstunden ... wozu bräuchten die Diener des Imperiums sonst eine gute Gesundheit und ein langes Leben?"
languages.original_text: "Grant each 'rejuvenated' individual a regular youth levy and overtime duties — after all, what good are health and long life to the servants of the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "Verpasst jedem 'verjüngten' Individuum eine Jugendsteuer und Überstunden ... wozu bräuchten die Diener des Imperiums sonst eine gute Gesundheit und ein langes Leben?"
